colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE GUN KUN DGA' 'DON LDAN ZHES BYA BA' I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS PI LIG THU DGE LSONG BLO BZANG BRTZON GRUS GNYIS KA'I 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN PO'I BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED, @007B DZA YA PAndi TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA YI GE PA NI DGE BSGOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O, ,)
